params.ptAmount: Amount of principal tokens to redeem.

params.ytAmount: Amount of yield tokens to sell.

params.amount: Amount of the underlying asset to tokenize.

params.stableAmount: Amount of stable asset to convert.

returns._0: stable Asset address (e.g., scUSD on Sonic).

ptToken().notice: Get the principal token contract created when splitting

redeemPrincipal(uint256).notice: Convert principal tokens back to the underlying asset.         Call this at or after maturity. Approve the adapter to spend         your principal tokens first

sellYtForStable(uint256).notice: Sell yield tokens for a stable asset. Approve the adapter to         spend your yield tokens first. Price reflects how much future         yield is worth today

splitAsset(uint256).notice: Split a yield-bearing token into principal and yield tokens.         Make sure to approve the adapter to spend your tokens first

stableToUnderlying(uint256).notice: Convert stable assets back to the underlying yield-bearing token.         This lets strategies treat the stable money from selling yield tokens         as part of their main position. Might swap through Pendle or other protocols

stableToken().notice: Get the stable token you receive when selling yield tokens

ytToken().notice: Get the yield token contract created when splitting
